# OF1 SOLUTIONS - Corporate Website Project

## Project Overview
Modern corporate website for OF1 SOLUTIONS optimized for Cloudflare Pages deployment.

## Technology Stack
- Pure HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (no frameworks)
- Responsive design (mobile-first approach)
- Cloudflare Pages for hosting

## Design Guidelines
- Color Palette:
  - Primary: #0078D4 (Tech Blue)
  - Secondary: #2DCCD3 (Turquoise Mint)
  - White: #FFFFFF
  - Gray: #E6E6E6 (Soft Silver)
- Typography: Sans Serif (Montserrat, Inter)
- Modern, clean, professional aesthetic
- Smooth animations on scroll

## Project Structure
```
/
├── index.html          # Main HTML file
├── styles.css          # All styles
├── scripts.js          # JavaScript functionality
├── assets/             # Images and icons
├── _headers            # Cloudflare headers config
├── wrangler.toml       # Cloudflare Pages config (optional)
└── README.md           # Documentation
```
